parameters.ObamaKerry: Percentage of vote won by Obama in 2008 minus Kerry percentage in 2004

reference: Professor Seth Stephens-Davidowitz studies the level of racial animus across different areas in America by measuring the percent of Google search queries that include racially charged language. A measurement, Animus, is derived from his algorithm and is scaled to be between 0 (low racial animus) and 250 (high racial animus). The dataset includes those values along with demographic information about each media market.
usage: A data frame with 196 observations on the following 7 variables.
title: Racial Animus and City Demgraphics
description:
Description
Demographics and a measurement of racial animus in cities based on Google searches
